chapter.heading: RESERVE COMPONENTS: STANDARDS AND PROCEDURES FOR RETENTION AND PROMOTION

section.heading: Reference to chapter 1219

content.p: Provisions of law relating to standards and procedures for retention and promotion of members of reserve components are set forth in chapter 1219 of this title (beginning with section 12641).

section.sourceCredit: (Added Pub. L. 103–337, div. A, title XVI, § 1662(h)(5), Oct. 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 2997.)
